titles.title: A bill to temporarily lower the rate of duty on glass inners designed for vacuum flasks.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to lower, through December 31, 1990, the rate of duty on glass inners designed for vacuum flasks or for other vacuum vessels.
